org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.system

Class ReusableCountDownLatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.system.ReusableCountDownLatch

  • public class ReusableCountDownLatch
extends java.lang.Object
    This is nothing more than a clone of CountDownLatch that additionally allows the count to be reset. We do this because we wish to use these in high volume and thus seek to avoid unnecessary memory pressure.
